r.d: This is the MySQL MDB2 driver.
r.n: - handle qualified table names in tableInfo() - aligned _modifyQuery() signature and phpdoc - added support for tabe options in createTable() (bug ##7079) - added optional database parameter to listTables() and listSequences() - added 'result_introspection' supported metadata support - properly quote table names in tableInfo() (related to bug #6573) - use connected_server_info in getServerVersion() as a cache cache - use parent::disconnect() in disconnect() - added support for length in integer reverse engineering - some fixes regarding boolean reverse engineering - added listViews() and hide views in listTables()
